title: OSXBytes iSonics v1.7.0 MacOSX Incl. Keygen-NOY [ATOM]
description:
Description:
iSonics makes it easy to convert any audio format to all popular audio formats: MP3, MP2, AAC, FLAC, ALAC, WMA, OGG Vorbis, Opus, AC3, AIFF and WAV.
It handles Metadata with ease and even enables you to change Metadata including automatically downloading cover pictures. 
As a bonus you can import CDs and convert the audio tracks to any audio format including metadata retrieved online.


Features:
Easy to use
Drag and drop audio or movie files and start converting.

Metadata handling
Editing metadata is easy for most audio formats.
Metadata can be auto retrieved online.

Import CDs
Import CDs and iSonics auto fill-in the metadata.

iTunes link
Imports converted audio into iTunes.

Audio Processing
Loudness Normalisation -23 LUFS (EBU R128) -24 LUFS (ATSC A/85), Peak Normalisation, Apply Earwax, ..

Folder Structure
Uses metadata to create structured folder names and file names.

Localized.
English, Dutch, Norwegean, Italian, German, French, Spanish, Brazillian Portuguese, Swedish, Croatian, Catalan, Arabic, Montenegrin...

Sparkle.
Keep your version up-to-date.


What's New:
-Updated several translations
-Fixed vertical scrollbar glitch
-Fixed issue scanning .cue files for splitting audio files
-Fixed memory leak when encoding to wavpack
